document: A study of A RAILROAD TERMINAL for SEATTLE Suggested scheme for unification of railroad facilities, with recommendations for city planning considerations in relation to and in the vicinity of the station. Submitted as partial fulfillment of the requirements for the Degrees of MASTER IN ARCHITECTURE To: William Wilson Wurster, Dean School of Architecture and Planning Massachusetts Institute of Technology September 20, 1946 By: Arnoid Gordon Gangnes B. Arch., University of Washington 1942
